column2: and my parents and I were standing
column4: in the parking lot of a Howard Johnson's in Iowa.|Soon I Will Be Invincible|Austin Grossman

column1: 06:20|Because when that clock said twenty past six it was really only five minutes past
column2: and at five minutes past I don't suppose Colonel Protheroe had even arrived at the house.|The murder at the Vicarage|Agatha Christie
